name: sedata
description: Get security data(China market only for now)

scripts.cup: coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push
scripts.cupminor: verion minor & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push
scripts.cupmajor: verion major & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push
scripts.cuppatch: verion patch & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor update' & git push
